mapper.select: SELECT post_title , user_nickname , post_updated_time FROM (SELECT p.post_title , p.post_user_seq , l.like_user_seq , IFNULL(p.post_created_time, post_updated_time) post_updated_time FROM post p JOIN `like` l ON p.post_seq = l.post_seq WHERE p.post_status = 'active') k JOIN users u ON k.post_user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE k.like_user_seq = #{userSeq}
